Trade/Device Name(s): ACCU-CHEK Inform II Blood Glucose Monitoring System
ACCU-CHEK Inform II Linearity Test Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACCU-CHEK Inform II blood glucose monitoring system including meter, test strip, controls, and linearity kit for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood samples
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in venous whole blood, arterial whole blood, neonatal heelstick, or fresh capillary whole blood as an aid in monitoring effectiveness of glucose control; intended for multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings, not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or for neonate cord blood.
